description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: A command injection issue was discovered on Supermicro X11SSM-F, X11SAE-F, and X11SSE-F 1.66 devices. An attacker can exploit this to elevate privileges from a user with BMC administrative privileges.

Se descubrió un problema de inyección de comandos en los dispositivos Supermicro X11SSM-F, X11SAE-F y X11SSE-F 1.66. Un atacante puede aprovechar esto para elevar los privilegios de un usuario con privilegios administrativos de BMC.
